title.description: Title of the shop. This the brief heading located at the shop's main page.

slogan.description: Slogan or catchword located at the shop's main page.

announcement.description: Announcement to buyers located at the shop's main page.

confirmation.description: Order confirmation text. Is shown to buyers when an order is created after a successful payment.

email.description: Email address located at the shop's main page. This can be different than the seller account's email.

phone.description: Phone number located at the shop's main page. This can be different than the seller account's phone number.

access.description: Represents whether the shop URL is publicly accessible.

cart.description: Represents whether the shopping cart is used during checkouts. If the cart value is FALSE multiple products can not be purchased at the shop, only a single product can be purchased for each order.

mobileView.description: Shop's appearance for mobile devices. Products can be placed either on a single column or on double columns.

filter.description: Represents whether the product filter options are present or not.

stockOutProducts.description: Represents whether the out of stock products are shown to buyers.

vacation.description: Represents whether the seller accepts orders. TRUE if the shop is closed for orders, FALSE if the shop is open for orders.
